codebookDescription: E34: Health care utilization. Was the child admitted to a hospital/health center for treatment of diarrheal illness. Only complete for children who had diarrhea in the last 2 weeks. If no, go to E36, if yes continue
E35: Health care utilization. To which hospital was the child admitted (health facility code for center of 1st choice). Skip if E34=no. Only complete for children who had diarrhea in the last 2 weeks
NA: Health care utilization.

E35.1: Health care utilization. To which hospital was the child admitted (health facility code for center of 2nd choice). Skip if E34=no. Only complete for children who had diarrhea in the last 2 weeks
NA: Health care utilization.

E35.2: Health care utilization. To which hospital was the child admitted (health facility code for center of 3rd choice). Skip if E34=no. Only complete for children who had diarrhea in the last 2 weeks
NA: Health care utilization.
E35.3: Health care utilization. If the facility was not coded, specify. Skip if E34=no. Only complete for children who had diarrhea in the last 2 weeks

E36: Health care utilization. If the child did not receive care at a hospital/health center, were you advised to take him/her to a hospital/health center. Skip if E34=yes. Only complete for children who had diarrhea in the last 2 weeks. If no, go to E38, if yes continue
A06.1: Eligibility information. Age (months). 15 is used for missing day in birthdate
A06.2: Eligibility information. Age category.
A06.3: Eligibility information. Age/gender category.
A01: Eligibility information. Child's age stratum (in months) according to the census.

G49: Health care attitudes. If a doctor or nurse recommended that you take your child for care at the nearest sentinel health center (specify which one), would you be likely to agree to do this. Section G: skip for children who had diarrhea in the last 2 weeks. If yes, go to G51. If no, continue.
A06.6: Eligibility information. Day of birth.
A06: Eligibility information. Birth date of the child. Use "00" for day if unknown
A06.5: Eligibility information. Month of birth.
A06.4: Eligibility information. Year of birth.

1. Child ID.

F46: Health care expenses. How much time have you spent taking care of the child when otherwise you would have been doing productive unpaid activities (e.g. housework, taking care of other children, farming, studying, or attending school). Only complete part F if the answer to E29 is "yes". 1/2 morning or afternoon=0.25 days; morning or afternoon=0.5days; nything less than half a morning or afternoon=0 days

F47: Health care expenses. How much time have other caregivers spent taking care of the child when otherwise they would have been doing productive unpaid activities (e.g. housework, taking care of other children, farming, studying, or attending school). Only complete part F if the answer to E29 is "yes". 1/2 morning or afternoon=0.25 days; morning or afternoon=0.5days; nything less than half a morning or afternoon=0 days

G51: Health care attitudes. Multifilter: Where would you seek care for the following? 1st choice for diarrhea with blood. Section G: skip for children who had diarrhea in the last 2 weeks.
